entries.title: 3D Tiles Clipping Planes
entries.description: Add clipping planes to a mesh 3D Tileset, point cloud 3D Tileset, and glTF model. Useful for exploring interiors or cutting away parts of geometry.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Compare
entries.description: Compare 3D Tiles tilesets by showing different ones on different sides of the screen.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Feature Picking
entries.description: Pick features in a 3D Tiles tileset.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Feature Styling
entries.description: Use 3D Tiles Styling to assign colors based on material or find all office buildings.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Formats
entries.description: Showcase of different 3D Tiles formats.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Gaussian Splatting
entries.description: A minimal code example of a 3D Gaussian splatting (or Gaussian splats) dataset rendered with 3D Tiles. This technique provides smooth, photorealistic surfaces, and is typically derrived from reality capture, LiDAR, or photogrammetry data.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Gaussian Splatting — Mesh Comparison
entries.description: Comapre a 3D Tiles power station dataset with Gaussian splatting (or Gaussian splats) rendering versus the same dataset using triangle-based mesh rendering. Notably, fine details like powerlines are better preserved when rendering the Gaussian splatting dataset.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Inspector
entries.description: Use the 3D Tiles inspector as a debugging tool for different tilesets.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Interactivity
entries.description: Interaction examples with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Interior
entries.description: A sample interior rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles NGA GPM Visualization
entries.description: An example for the visualization of NGA_gpm_local extension data

entries.title: 3D Tiles Photogrammetry
entries.description: A sample photogrammetry dataset rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Photogrammetry Classification
entries.description: Demonstrates a photogrammetry dataset using feature ID textures to encode metadata with EXT_mesh_features. 3D Tiles 1.1 enables classification, styling, and querying individual features in photogrammetry datasets.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Photogrammetry Classification
entries.description: Sample photogrammetry and classification datasets both rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Photogrammetry with KTX2
entries.description: Compare photogrammetry performance between 3D Tiles 1.0 and 3D Tiles 1.1 with KTX2 texture compression. KTX2 reduces GPU memory usage and improves runtime efficiency when visualizing large-scale photogrammetry datasets.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Point Cloud
entries.description: A sample point cloud dataset rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Point Cloud Classification
entries.description: A sample Vector dataset on terrain rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Point Cloud Shading
entries.description: Point Cloud Attenuation and Eye Dome Lighting example.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Point Cloud Styling
entries.description: Example styles for a point cloud tileset.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Styling
entries.description: Shows how to style 3D Tiles by hierarchical class and properties (e.g., buildings → doors → doorknobs). Demonstrates 3D Tiles Style predicates like `isClass` and `isExactClass` and coloring or filtering by element property data.

entries.title: 3D Tiles Terrain Classification
entries.description: A sample Vector dataset on terrain rendered with 3D Tiles.

entries.title: Aerometrex San Francisco
entries.description: Aerometrex San Francisco High Resolution 3D Model with Street Level Enhanced 3D.

entries.title: Ambient Occlusion
entries.description: Ambient Occlusion.

entries.title: ArcGIS MapServer
entries.description: Add imagery from an ArcGIS MapServer.

entries.title: ArcGIS Tiled Elevation Terrain
entries.description: Add terrain from an ArcGIS Server.

entries.title: ArcticDEM
entries.description: High-resolution arctic terrain from the Arctic DEM project (Release 4) and hosted by Cesium ion.

entries.title: Atmosphere
entries.description: Modify atmospheric scattering parameters.

entries.title: Billboards
entries.description: Add billboard images and markers to the scene.

entries.title: BIM Design Model with 3D Tiles
entries.description: Render and interact with a Building Information Modeling (BIM) design model dataset using 3D Tiles. Highlights per-feature selection, global element IDs, and visibility control—useful for inspecting and managing complex engineering or infrastructure models.

entries.title: Bing Maps Labels Only
entries.description: Use Cesium ion's Bing Maps Labels Only imagery asset to add labels to unlabeled imagery.

entries.title: Bloom
entries.description: Add bloom effect to the scene.

entries.title: Blue Marble
entries.description: Blue Marble Next Generation July, 2004 imagery from NASA and hosted by Cesium ion.

entries.title: Box
entries.description: Draw a box.

entries.title: Callback Position Property
entries.description: Use a CallbackPositionProperty when your data can't be pre-computed or needs to be derived from other properties at runtime.

entries.title: Callback Property
entries.description: Use Viewer to start building new applications or easily embed Cesium into existing applications.

entries.title: Camera
entries.description: Fly to a specified location or view a geographic rectangle.

entries.title: Camera Tutorial
entries.description: Use the camera to control the view, and create custom event handlers for input.

entries.title: Cardboard
entries.description: Configure viewer to add a button enabling look at a mobile device with cardboard.

entries.title: Cartographic Limit Rectangle
entries.description: Limit terrain and imagery to a cartographic Rectangle area.

entries.title: CDB Metadata in 3D Tiles
entries.description: Demonstrates loading a 3D Tiles 1.1 tileset converted from CDB, carrying through detailed metadata. 3D Tiles enables runtime styling, filtering, and querying features using CDB attributes.

entries.title: Cesium OSM Buildings
entries.description: Worldwide 3D buildings with rich metadata from OpenStreetMap.

entries.title: Cesium Widget
entries.description: A minimal CesiumJS example that initializes a 3D globe and loads default imagery. Use the CesiumWidget to create a 3D view without the default UI widgets.

entries.title: Cesium World Terrain
entries.description: High-resolution global terrain tileset curated from several datasources and hosted by Cesium ion.

entries.title: Circles and Ellipses
entries.description: Draw circles, ellipses, and extruded volumes that conform to the surface of the globe.

entries.title: Clamp Entities to Ground
entries.description: Clamp entities to terrain and 3D Tiles

entries.title: Clamp Model to Ground
entries.description: Clamp a dynamic 3D model to a 3D Tileset or terrain using height references.

entries.title: Clamp to 3D Model
entries.description: Clamp a point and label to a model using the sampleHeight function.

entries.title: Classification
entries.description: Draw the intersection of a volume and a photgrammetry dataset.

entries.title: Classification Types
entries.description: Draw the intersection of a volume and a photgrammetry dataset and terrain.

entries.title: Clipping Regions
entries.description: Use Viewer to start building new applications or easily embed Cesium into existing applications.

entries.title: Cloud Parameters
entries.description: Modify the appearance of a procedural cumulus cloud.

entries.title: Clustering
entries.description: Cluster labels, billboards and points.

entries.title: Coloring and Styling glTF Models
entries.description: Customize the appearance of glTF models in CesiumJS using colors, blend modes, transparency, and silhouettes. Useful for highlighting, theming, and differentiating models in a scene at runtime.

entries.title: Corridor
entries.description: Draw a corridor.

entries.title: Custom DataSource
entries.description: A custom DataSource implementation.

entries.title: Custom Geocoder
entries.description: Attach a custom data source to the geocoder widget.

entries.title: Custom Per-Feature Post Process
entries.description: Custom per-feature post processing effect.

entries.description: Custom post processing effect.

entries.description: Create 3D models using glTF.

entries.description: Create 3D models using glTF.

entries.description: Create 3D models using glTF.

entries.description: Draw a cylinder or cone.

entries.description: A simple CZML example showing four satellites in orbit around the Earth, and some ground objects.

entries.title: DataSource Ordering
entries.description: Change the order in which DataSources draw ground primitives

entries.title: Depth of Field
entries.description: Depth of field.

entries.title: Design Model – Category Filtering
entries.description: Filter and isolate elements of an architectural design model using 3D Tiles metadata. By toggling categories such as walls, floors, stairs, and doors, metadata-driven styling simplifies inspection of complex AEC datasets.

entries.title: Design Model – Layer Control and Metadata Picking
entries.description: Explore an architectural design model using layer visibility toggles and metadata-driven picking. Useful for understanding complex AEC datasets, highlighting specific building systems (e.g., facade, HVAC, structural), and inspecting detailed attributes at runtime.

entries.title: Design Model – Metadata Styling
entries.description: Dynamically style an architectural design model from Autodesk Revit based on embedded metadata. 3D Tiles metadata can drive interactive visualization—such as highlighting HVAC pipes by length—supporting analysis of complex AEC datasets.

entries.title: Design Model – Terrain Inset
entries.description: Use clipping regions to hide the area under a model or 3D tileset.

entries.title: Distance Display Conditions
entries.description: Distance display conditions

entries.title: Drawing on Terrain
entries.description: Draw lines and polygons on terrain with mouse clicks.

entries.title: Earth at Night
entries.description: NASA-generated imagery of the earth at night hosted on Cesium ion. Also known as Black Marble and Night Lights.

entries.title: Elevation Band Material
entries.description: Apply elevation band material to the globe.

entries.title: Entity tracking
entries.description: Apply different tracking reference frames to tracked entities.

entries.title: Expand Clustered Billboards
entries.description: Expand a cluster of overlapping billboards with a star burst display.

entries.title: Export KML
entries.description: How to export a subset of a CesiumJS scene as a KML/KMZ file.

entries.title: Fog Post Process
entries.description: Fog post process

entries.title: FXAA
entries.description: Add FXAA to the scene.

entries.title: GeoJSON and TopoJSON
entries.description: Load GeoJSON or TopoJSON data and apply custom styling.

entries.title: GeoJSON simplestyle
entries.description: Load GeoJSON with simplestyle information.

entries.title: Geometry and Appearances
entries.description: Demonstrates the wide variety of available geometry and appearances.

entries.title: Geometry Height Reference
entries.description: An example for how to use the HeightReference property on different geometry entities.

entries.title: Global Bathymetry
entries.description: Worldwide, high-resolution bathymetry data using World Bathymetry Terrain from Cesium ion. Includes lighting, contour lines, and elevation color ramps to highlight seafloor features—useful for oceanographic visualization, geospatial analysis, and educational exploration.

entries.title: Globe Interior
entries.description: View the interior of the globe by enabling translucency on imagery layers.

entries.title: Globe Materials
entries.description: Apply an elevation map to the globe.

entries.title: Globe Materials – 3D Tiles Terrain
entries.description: Load a 3D Tiles tileset as terrain, and apply globe material properties to style the terrain.

entries.title: Globe Materials – Water Mask Elevation Map
entries.description: Apply materials to the globe.

entries.title: Globe Translucency
entries.description: View datasets underneath the surface with globe translucency.

entries.title: glTF Models
entries.description: Load and visualize glTF and glb models with entities, including examples with compression (Draco, KTX2), instancing, and animations. Useful for learning how to place, orient, and scale 3D models in the scene for use cases like vehicles, characters, or custom assets.

entries.title: glTF PBR Next
entries.description: Use glTF extensions for materials designed for physically-based rendering (PBR). Useful for effects like metal, automotive paint, and anisotropic reflections.

entries.title: Google 2D Tiles
entries.description: Global imagery data from Google Maps.

entries.title: Google 2D Tiles with Custom Styles
entries.description: Imagery tiles from Google Maps with additional parameters to create overlays and custom styles.

entries.title: Google Earth Enterprise
entries.description: Add imagery from a Web Map Service (WMS) server.

entries.description: Use Viewer to start building new applications or easily embed Cesium into existing applications.

entries.description: Use Viewer to start building new applications or easily embed Cesium into existing applications.

entries.description: A simple GPX example.

entries.title: HeadingPitchRoll
entries.description: Use HeadingPitchRoll

entries.title: Hello World
entries.description: A minimal CesiumJS example that initializes a 3D globe and loads default imagery. Use the Cesium Viewer Widget to start building new applications or embed Cesium into existing applications including starter UI like the timeline and geocoding.

entries.title: High Dynamic Range
entries.description: Toggle High Dynamic Range (HDR).

entries.title: HTML Overlays
entries.description: Add HTML overlay using canvas coordinates.

entries.title: I3S Building Scene Cesium Demo
entries.description: Add I3S Building Scene Layer from a service.

entries.title: I3S Consumption Cesium Demo
entries.description: Add I3S 3D Object Layer from a service.

entries.title: I3S Consumption Cesium Demo
entries.description: Add I3S IntegratedMesh Layer from a service.

entries.title: I3S Feature Picking Cesium Demo
entries.description: Pick features from an I3S 3D Object Layer.

entries.title: Image-Based Lighting
entries.description: Use image-based lighting to light a model.

entries.title: Imagery Adjustment
entries.description: Adjust brightness, contrast, hue, saturation, and gamma of an imagery layer.

entries.title: Imagery Assets available from ion
entries.description: Global imagery assets available from Cesium ion.

entries.title: Imagery Color To Alpha
entries.description: Apply simple color-to-alpha on imagery layers.

entries.title: Imagery Cutout
entries.description: Demonstration of imagery layers with rectangular cutouts.

entries.title: Imagery Layers
entries.description: Create imagery layers from multiple sources.

entries.title: Imagery Layers Manipulation
entries.description: Layer imagery from multiple sources, including WMS servers, Bing Maps, ArcGIS Online, OpenStreetMaps, and more, and adjust the alpha of each independently.

entries.title: Imagery Layers Split
entries.description: Use the split property to only show layers on one side of a slider.

entries.title: Imagery Layers Texture Filters
entries.description: Set the texture minification and magnification filters of an imagery layer.

entries.title: iModel Mesh Export Service
entries.description: Stream iModel design data from the iTwin platform with 3D Tiles, enabling a sharable workflow with feature picking, styling, and integration with surrounding reality meshes.

entries.title: Interpolation
entries.description: Construct new data points within the range of a discrete set of known data points.

entries.title: iTwin Feature Service
entries.description: Connect to the iTwin Feature Service to stream and style geospatial features (points, lines, areas), derrived by AI from reality data, alongside 3D reality meshes and point clouds to build a contextual digital twin app.

entries.title: Japan Buildings
entries.description: City-scale dataset of Japan 3D buildings with rich metadata derived from OpenStreetMap, hosted on Cesium ion. Includes regional terrain and camera fly-tos for landmarks like Tokyo Tower, Kyoto, and Mt. Fuji.

entries.title: KML
entries.description: A simple KML example.

entries.title: KML Tours
entries.description: A simple KML example.

entries.title: Labels
entries.description: Create and style textual labels.

entries.title: LensFlare
entries.description: Lens Flare.

entries.title: Lighting
entries.description: Set custom light direction and color.

entries.title: LocalToFixedFrame
entries.description: Use localFrameToFixedFrameGenerator for adequate rotation.

entries.title: Manually Controlled Animation
entries.description: Manually control a model's animations.

entries.title: Map Pins
entries.description: Create and display map pins.

entries.title: Mars
entries.description: Mars terrain visualized using 3D Tiles, tiled and hosted by Cesium ion, with atmospheric effects, points of interest, and rover paths of NASA's Curiosity and Perseverance. Combine a 3D dataset with CZML/GeoJSON to create an interactive Mars exploration app.

entries.title: Material with Custom GLSL
entries.description: Browse Cesium's built in materials and define new ones using the Fabric schema.

entries.title: Materials
entries.description: Browse Cesium's built in materials and define new ones using the Fabric schema.

entries.title: Montreal Point Cloud
entries.description: Point cloud of the city of Montreal, Canada captured in 2015 with a resolution of 20 cm. Tiled and hosted by Cesium ion.

entries.title: Moon
entries.description: High-resolution lunar terrain using 3D Tiles from Cesium ion, with Apollo landing sites, craters, mare boundaries, and potential Artemis landing regions. Combining 3D data with GeoJSON overlays and interactive camera flights to create an immersive Moon app.

entries.title: MSAA
entries.description: Add MSAA to the scene.

entries.title: Multi-part CZML
entries.description: A CZML example showing a single entity path split across multiple CZML streams.

entries.title: Multiple Synced Views
entries.description: Multiple views synced across time and space.

entries.title: Natural Earth II
entries.description: Natural Earth II with Shaded Relief, Water, and Drainages hosted by Cesium ion.

entries.title: Offline
entries.description: Demo the minimum set of options needed to remove all external dependencies, for offline operation.

entries.title: Offset 3D Tileset Height
entries.description: Change the vertical position of a 3D Tileset by applying a translation matrix. Useful for aligning datasets with terrain.

entries.title: Overlay Imagery on 3D Tiles
entries.description: Drape 2D raster imagery, such as roads and labels, over a 3D Tiles reality mesh streamed from the iTwin Platform. Overlaying 2D images on 3D geospatial context can improve user readability and navigation.

entries.title: PAMAP Terrain
entries.description: High resolution terrain of Pennsylvania curated by PASDA and hosted on Cesium ion.

entries.title: Parallels and Meridians
entries.description: Use polylines to draw parallels and meridians on the globe.

entries.description: Draw whole/partial spheres and ellipsoids.

entries.description: Particle systems.

entries.description: Particle systems for rocket and comet tails.

entries.title: Particle System Weather
entries.description: Particle systems for rain and snow.

entries.description: Post processing effects.

entries.title: Physically-Based Materials
entries.description: Create 3D models with realistic materials using glTF 2.0.

entries.description: Use the mouse to select and manipulate objects in the scene.

entries.description: Draw a plane geometry.

entries.description: Add points to the scene.

entries.title: Polygon
entries.description: Draw a polygon or extruded polygon on the globe surface.

entries.description: Draw polylines with various widths and materials.

entries.description: Draw a polyline volume, which is a shape extruded along a polyline.

entries.description: Display polylines on BIM and Photogrammetry 3D Tiles

entries.description: Generate procedural heightmap terrain.

entries.description: Change the projection between perspective and orthographic.

entries.title: Rectangle

entries.title: Resolution Scaling
entries.description: Set a custom resolution scale and/or toggle the browser's recommended resolution.

entries.title: Rotatable 2D Map
entries.description: Configure viewer to make the 2D map rotatable.

entries.title: S2 Globe with 3D Tiles
entries.description: Loads a One World Terrain dataset, courtesy Maxar,—A global scale 3D Tiles 1.1 tileset that uses 3DTILES_bounding_volume_S2, a schema for defining bounding volumes as hierarchical cells composing a unit sphere. This extension is well suited for tilesets that span the whole globe as, opposed to traditional GIS projections such as Web Mercator which can create distortions in scale, divides an ellipsoid into cells of relatively similar size.

entries.title: Sample Height from 3D Tiles
entries.description: Sample the most detailed heights of a 3D Tileset.

entries.title: Scene Rendering Performance
entries.description: Use explicit rendering to improve app performance.

entries.title: Sentinel-2
entries.description: Sentinel-2 cloudless by EOX IT Services GmbH (Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel data 2016 and 2017). Hosted by Cesium ion

entries.title: Shadows
entries.description: Shadow maps.

entries.title: Show or Hide Entities
entries.description: Show or hide groups of entities.

entries.title: Spheres and Ellipsoids
entries.description: Draw spheres and ellipsoids.

entries.title: SplitDirection
entries.description: Using the SplitDirection parameter to hide or draw Points or Billboards depending on the position of the slider.

entries.title: Terrain
entries.description: Visualize worldwide, high-resolution terrain.

entries.title: Terrain Clipping Planes
entries.description: User-defined clipping planes applied to terrain.

entries.title: Terrain Exaggeration
entries.description: Exaggerate terrain.

entries.title: Time Dynamic Point Cloud
entries.description: Render a time dynamic point cloud from a set of Point Cloud tiles and timestamps.

entries.title: Time Dynamic Wheels
entries.description: Dynamically rotate a model's wheels based on its velocity using node transformations.

entries.title: Underground Color
entries.description: Use Viewer to start building new applications or easily embed Cesium into existing applications.

entries.title: Vertical Exaggeration with 3D Tiles
entries.description: Apply vertical exaggeration globally to Google Photorealistic 3D Tiles. Exaggerating terrain or building heights can make subtle features easier to see—like highlighting elevation differences at scale or emphasizing aspects of design models.

entries.title: Video
entries.description: Use a video element as a material

entries.title: Volumetric Cloud
entries.description: Render a voumetric cloud with a 3D texture and custom shader code. This example was ported from Three.js's "Volumetric Cloud" example.

entries.title: Voxel Picking
entries.description: Use the cursor to select and inspect individual voxel cells.

entries.title: Voxel Rendering
entries.description: Create and render voxel primitives of different shapes (box, ellipsoid, cylinder) using procedural data. Metadata and custom shaders can control voxel appearance, transparency, and lighting effects—useful for volumetric visualization and scientific analysis.

entries.title: Voxels in 3D Tiles
entries.description: Load voxel datasets as 3D tiles.

entries.title: Wall
entries.description: Draw a wall on the globe surface.

entries.title: Washington DC 2017
entries.description: 3 inch/0.08 meter pixel resolution imagery of the District of Columbia. Hosted by Cesium ion

entries.description: Add imagery from a Web Map Service (WMS) server.
